title: Recogniz.ing Changelog
description: AI-powered voice typing with real-time transcription powered by Google's Gemini AI.

highlights: New Changelog system with JSON and Markdown formats
Updated landing page with modern design

changes.title: Changelog System
changes.description: New structured changelog with JSON format for landing page display and Markdown for GitHub. Includes beautiful Vue component with filtering and search.

changes.title: Deployment Architecture
changes.description: Simplified single-repository deployment using GitHub Actions. Release workflow automatically commits downloads to landing folder and triggers GitHub Pages deployment.

changes.title: Repository Structure
changes.description: Consolidated to xicv/recogniz.ing as the single source of truth. Both Flutter app and Vue landing page now in one repository.

changes.title: Documentation
changes.description: Updated README.md files with latest deployment architecture, added CLAUDE.md section for landing page deployment.

changes.title: Outdated Files
changes.description: Removed outdated DEPLOYMENT.md and Flutter-generated recognizing/README.md files.

highlights: Initial Windows release with native installer

changes.title: macOS Gatekeeper
changes.description: Fixed macOS Gatekeeper verification issues with improved app signing and notarization.

changes.title: Windows Release
changes.description: Initial Windows release with native installer support. Download as recognizing-{version}-windows.zip

changes.title: Build System
changes.description: Fixed make quick-run command to properly clean build directory and prevent code signing errors.

changes.title: Platform Icons
changes.description: Updated landing page platform icons - iMac for macOS, Apple logo for iOS for better visual representation.

changes.title: Performance
changes.description: Enhanced stability and performance improvements across all platforms.

highlights: Version management system with semantic versioning

changes.title: Version Management
changes.description: Comprehensive semantic versioning system with automated tools (Dart script, shell script, Makefile targets).

changes.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
changes.description: Added Cmd/Ctrl+S keyboard shortcut for saving edited transcriptions.

changes.title: Settings Navigation
changes.description: Fixed menu bar Settings navigation to open correct Settings tab.

changes.title: Deployment System
changes.description: Automated build and deployment pipeline for all platforms to landing page.

changes.title: Code Signing
changes.description: macOS code signing and notarization support for distribution.

changes.title: Landing Page
changes.description: New landing page with download management system and version tracking.

highlights: Initial release with core voice typing functionality

changes.title: Voice Recording
changes.description: Smart voice activity detection (VAD) with configurable sensitivity and RMS-based audio analysis.

changes.title: AI Transcription
changes.description: Powered by Google Gemini 1.5 Flash with intelligent noise filtering and silence detection.

changes.title: Custom Prompts
changes.description: 6 pre-configured prompts (Clean, Formal, Bullets, Email, Meeting Notes, Social Media) with custom prompt creation.

changes.title: Vocabulary Sets
changes.description: 6 industry vocabulary sets (General, Technology, Business, Medical, Legal, Finance).

changes.title: Dashboard
changes.description: Real-time transcription history with search, usage statistics, and inline editing.

changes.title: Global Hotkeys
changes.description: Desktop global hotkey support (Cmd+Shift+Space / Ctrl+Shift+Space) with system tray integration.

changes.title: Themes
changes.description: Material Design 3 UI with dark/light theme support and system preference detection.
